name: The Bog Roll Knight
description:
The Bog Roll Knight

Your name is Justin and you're known as The Bog Roll Knight, but not to your delight! Experience the imaginative world from the mind of Justin as you prove yourself as a noble and heroic Knight!

However, you won't be alone on your journey! Your best friend Emrys the Wizard Frog will be there to help and guide you throughout your adventures as you journey to the castle for the Princess's birthday party!

-------

Experience the Education

  • Choose between the English and Math Route!
  • Experience the stunning stylized visuals.
  • Each Route currently has four puzzles with each puzzle having different questions related to the subject chosen.
  • Get awarded for completing Puzzles with: Stickers!

-------

This project was created as part of a second year university brief at the University of South Wales, in association with Tiny Rebel Games. The module brief was "The 2020 Which Wasn't". Teams had to make games that were 8 to 10 minutes long, with a novel interaction system, about an event that might have happened in 2020 but didn't.
